page.title: 14MALVERN FIRESTATION
page.content: The new Malvern firestation was completed in 1985.On average they have about 350 fires a year.They employ 7 full-time workers and 15 part-time.The fireman in charge did not think it was a dangerous job because they have a strict routine and various safety checks.He enjoys his job a lot but it is not an easy job.At the Malvern firestation they have four fire-engines.If we had a fire at Malvern Link Junior School we would call them and it would take them about a minute to 2 minutes to reach us.Most of the fires occur during the day but the serious ones are night.In the summer most of the fires are grass fires.To build the firestation it cost about 3 quartes of a million pounds and was designed to blend in with the hills.
